system_forbidden: Forbidden move! Please choose another location.
system_denied_spot: You cannot place a stone there.
system_bomb_fail: Couldn't find a good spot to place a bomb.
system_no_move: AI could not find a place to move.
ai_reason_template: I will place a stone at {coord} {reason}.
ai_veto_reason: I deny your destiny leading to {coord}.
ai_bomb_place_reason: I will place a bomb at {coord}.
ai_double_move_1: I will place the first stone at {coord}.
ai_double_move_2: And now, the second stone at {coord}!
ai_swap_reason: I will use a cheat to swap your stone({userCoord}) with my stone({aiCoord}).
reason_win: because I can win with this move
reason_attack_4: to create a decisive Live Four
reason_block_4: to block your Live Four attack
reason_attack_3: to create a strong Live Three attack
reason_block_3: to block your Live Three attack

notes: Improved AI reasoning and explanation logic
